comment: CS3410 with this professor is easy but CS3305 is very difficult. Bad lectures. Quizzes(no webcam) are mostly based on self testing questions. Exams with WEBCAM are based everything she posted(all material in d2l and assignment). Textbook are not really needed for the exams. PLEASE visit GTA for assignments.

This is not a hard class. Quizzes are no lockdown and the exam are with lockdown but no webcam. The assignment and lab might be very confusing. This professor doesn't properly respond to your email. She either dont understand common English or the material in this course. You wont learn anything from her. However, the lecture that she uses are good

One of the worst CS professors. You'll have to teach yourself Java. Assignments are long and difficult, tests are beyond the scope of the lectures, and there's no feedback at all. Uses LockDown Browser + webcam, which adds stress. Grading is harsh and support is minimal. Would not recommend.

She gave hard homework and even did not know about wrong questions. Even she notified homework was wrong but still keeping students redo it. Quiz was extremely hard and matching questions even not enough time to do it. Tests was hard also. No extra credit. She tried to make your grades dropped. Please avoid her at all if you can.

The professor's accent was hard to understand. She mostly read off the PowerPoint slides, but overall, this course wasn't crazy difficult, and she made an effort to present. The quiz answers are all online. Do the knowledge checks. The assignments are okay, not too difficult. I've reached out to her with email for extensions, and she gave it.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: This was the worst professor I have ever taken. She has a heavy accent and only reads textbook-generated powerpoints for the lectures word-for-word without explaining any of it. I felt unprepared for all of the exams and quizzes. Please do not take Professor Wang.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Test heavy

comment: The midterm and final are so different from all the content, videos, and assignments in this case it was hugely disappointing to know there would be no real practice provided for the final after taking the midterm. Most of the content in the actual class is theory and code while the final was written logic problems. Must read proffesor's mind.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: Unless you are Daredevil yourself and have supersonic hearing, don't take this class. She whispers in her lectures and gets quieter everyday.

CS 3305: I took this online. All the assignments were pretty straightforward. The lecture videos suck, the slides are okay. Wish there was more context on actual code in the videos but nothing you can't figure out on your own. All the quiz were pretty easy then for the midterm it was 5 written response q's? It was so random and difficult. STUDY!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: Please don't take her. I got a B in her class but her accent makes it hard to understand what she's saying. On top of that, she only shows videos to teach -- she herself won't teach the material. On the bright side, all of the questions for quizzes and exams are from the textbook, so that's a good part.

Teacher is a fraud and doesn't teach; she links every module to another chinese professor who uses his own outdated textbook ( Daniel Liang on YouTube). Nothing prepared me for the midterm exam, which was a lockdown browser with 5 open-response questions in poorly explained pseudo code, requiring answers in pseudo code or Java in a text box.

Proff. Wang is the worst professor I have ever had in my entire life. Not only does she not know enough of the topics she covers, but she expects her students to complete quizzes almost every single week. She is not able to create well done quizzes, presentations, meetings or literally anything she intends to do. Please do not take this professor.

For the love of god do not take her the material itself is not the worst but when combined with her low-toned speaking, hands-off teaching, and her tendency to put the wrong answers on the quizzes it can become a mess. She tends to not even know what she is talking about, and for a teacher that is supposed to be tech-savvy, she is anything but that
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Group projects

comment: Quite honestly the single worst professor I have ever had by a lsrge margin. She says very little during the actual classes with there being multiple points where she says nothing for extended periods of time while you read the powerpoint on your own. For some assignments she took points off for things that weren't at all part of the assignment.

Whatever you do please avoid taking her. She hardly taught anything and expected you to know all the information and more. She was a very hard grader but made it difficult to get good grades because her exams were very redundant and inconsistent leading to confusion. Her instructions for assignments were also very confusing and often made so sense
